nodes.text: Broga Masrii, more commonly known as Broga the Hutt, was a Hutt who led the Three Families during the Cold War. During the Quesh war, Broga and his fellow clan leaders Portho Kaltemmic and Jeelta Urdosh were forced to side with the Galactic Republic against the Sith Empire and the Hutt Cartel. However, Portho and Jeelta died, but Broga lived after the war.
Though Broga was forced to work for the Empire, he was eventually rescued by the Republic.
